# Reproducible Analytical Pipelines - RAP {#RAP}

[Government Statistical Service](https://gss.civilservice.gov.uk/reproducible-analytical-pipelines/) is a comprehensive website detailing what RAP is, how it's good practice and links to other resources.

[A technical communication document](https://github.com/ukgovdatascience/rap_companion) written using bookdown intended to give assistance to people developing a Reproducible Analytical Pipeline.

NHS Digital [Community of Practice](https://github.com/NHSDigital/rap-community-of-practice) includes all analysts and data scientists who are interested in adopting the working practices included in reproducible analytical pipelines (RAP) at NHS Digital.

### Python

NHS Digital [Python RAP Package Template](https://github.com/NHSDigital/rap-package-template)
